meanings.definition: A print made from a design cut in a block of wood.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful woodcut of a tree.
meanings.sent2: I bought a woodcut of a flower to hang on my wall.
meanings.sent3: The woodcut of a cat wearing sunglasses made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a woodcut.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the woodcut brought the scene to life.

meanings.definition: A block of wood with a design cut into it for making prints.
meanings.sent1: The woodcut was carefully carved to create the perfect image.
meanings.sent2: She used a woodcut of a bird to make prints on fabric.
meanings.sent3: The woodcut of a fish seemed to swim off the block.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a woodcut, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh wood filled the room as she worked on the woodcut.

meanings.definition: To make a print from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: She decided to woodcut a scene from the forest onto paper.
meanings.sent2: He carefully woodcut the image onto a piece of cloth.
meanings.sent3: The artist woodcutted a beautiful landscape with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her words woodcut into his heart, leaving a mark.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the woodcutting tool echoed in the workshop as he worked.
